author: Ahmed Aboudouh, Ahmed Aboudouh
title: I spent hours trying to convince my contacts in the Middle East that the US is not behind coronavirus – and I failed
description: Conspiracy theories are spreading faster than the virus, providing fertile ground for extremists seeking new acts of terrorism while the world shelters at home
content:
The coronavirus pandemic might have deeply changed our daily lives, but we are not alone. Terrorism is changing too and, with it, an increase in surveillance measures and infringements of our privacy. 
In the age of deserted cities, self-isolation and the co… [+4693 chars]
